shouldMatch:
<configuration>
    <appSettings>
        <add key="LogFilePath" value="C:\logs\application.log" />
        <add key="ConfigPath" value="/usr/local/etc/config.xml" />
        <add key="TemplateDir" value="../templates" />
    </appSettings>
</configuration>
shouldNotMatch:
# Definition of the "High Contrast" theme.
# Author: Jeebs (Fisher Evans)

logoImage = icons/hicon/logo.png

statusImage = icons/hicon/status.png
settingsImage = icons/hicon/settings.png

# Definition of the http://www.midnightfun.co.uk/ "MidnightFun" theme.
